content: There's some movement towards tracking provenance in xarray. If people are interested, please comment here: https://discourse.pangeo.io/t/tracking-provenance-in-xarray/1510 or here: https://github.com/xarray-contrib/cf-xarray/issues/228
@Deepak Cherian could you explain what you mean by tracking provenance?
my vague understanding is "tracking and recording all operations from raw dataset to final analysis output in a standard way"
